entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
